_sText: It is T vs. CT, you will spawn in a stadium where you have to knife the opposite team. But 1 of the players on both teams are teleported to their cannon, and have to shoot the floor under the enemy's team. Beware though, you can shoot your own team down. (When one of the 2 teams are shot down, the player that controls the cannon on the losers team, will die too) The cannons shoots 5 different things: (when you fire, the cannon chooses randomly 1 of the 5 things) Green filecase Dryer Rock Computer monitor Radiator It is quite fun, and i hope you will think that too. If I did not say enough please write a comment. For those who wanted lighting (suns and shadows), It just couldn't happen/ did not work! + It is a minigame map so it does not really matter - Enjoy This is the sequel of my original map (there were a fault with version 2, therefore v3): mg_smashfloor
